lead_paragraph: KUGLER--Vivienne B. June 27, 2016 at age 90. Beloved wife of the late Solomon Kugler, dear sister of Adrienne Thau, cherished mother of Andrea Krimko (Howard) and Terry Makover (Michael), adored grandmother of Stuart, Heather, Matthew, Becca, and great-grandmother to her precious Ivy Maya. Forever wise, elegant and young. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KUGLER, VIVIENNE B
